page.title: 04TRANSPORT
page.content: To the North of the area, there are many {suburban}roads. Running south and east is the {A5096}which becomes the {A46}at a large roundabout. The {A46}to the west of the roundabout leads to the {junction}of the {M1 and {M69}motorways.The {M1}runs from{London {to Leeds}and the {M69}runs from { {Leicester }to{Coventry. On 1st May 1985,we counted the traffic from the A46 roundabout to the motorway junction. In one hour we saw _ 770 cars _ 439 lorries. We also counted _ 650 cars _ 436 lorries travelling in the other direction,towards the roundabout.
